abstract.t: This document analysis the use of hashes in SeND, possible threatsand the impact of recent attacks on hash functions used by SeND.Current SeND specification [rfc3971] uses SHA-1 [sha-1] hashalgorithm and PKIX certificates [rfc3280] and does not providesupport for the hash algorithm agility. Based on previous analysis,this document suggests multiple hash support that should be includedin the SeND update specification.
